meta.description: Minimize the total number of trips needed to send at least 500 boxes of corn using ferry and light rail, with constraints on capacity and trip ratios.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_MODES
sets.description: Modes of transport available for sending corn.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each transport mode in boxes of corn.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each transport mode.

objective.name: min_total_trips
objective.description: Minimize the total number of trips.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 boxes of corn are sent.

constraints.name: trip_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: The number of light rail trips must be at least 4 times the number of ferry trips.
